title.rendered: “You are the winning user of Boletazo”: The new scam lurking in Sinaloa

content.rendered:
Click here and find more information about Línea Directa Portal on our Google News page

Culiacán, Sin.- A new modality of fraud is the one being reported in Sinaloaand it is that, some people from the north of the state are reporting receiving a message via WhatsApp in which it is ensured to be the “winning user” of 200 thousand pesos in cash.

Through the instant messaging application an image arrives in which supposedly ticket and the Secretary of the Interior is rewarding mobile phone users with the economic sum.

“The company Boletazo notifies you that you are the winning user of the cash bonus for the platforms of the telephone companies that, with the government agreement, are contributing economic amounts in different states”, can be read in the image.

In the document, which lacks any official validity, it is requested to call the contact number with Lada of the Mexico City 5529645410, while the name of a SEGOB intervenor is allegedly given.

It is said that it will be the executives on the line who will give advice to be able to collect the money, however, everything is a trap.

People who receive this message exposed here are asked to ignore it and even report it, because the Ministry of the Interior does not have any program of rewards of that type.
